code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 60 yr old white female wrangler presents with Kidney. she smokes 1 pack daily for 2 years she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 61 in, Weight 137 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 103, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lisinopril - 20 mg daily, and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel, Urinalysis.

s:F aged 61 yrs presents with Kidney for more than 11 days. she admits to smoking one pack/day for the last 2 years she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 61 in, Weight 138 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lisinopril - 20 mg daily, and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel, Urinalysis.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
